alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:03PM MST until February 17 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...North Laramie Range and lower elevations of Converse County including Douglas, Bill, and Esterbrook. * WHEN...8 PM MST this evening until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
